original_text: And every daughter, that possesseth an inheritance in any tribe of the children of Israel, shall be wife unto one of the family of the tribe of her father, that the children of Israel may enjoy every man the inheritance of his fathers.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 지파 중 그 기업을 이은 딸들은 모두 자기 조상 지파의 종족되는 사람의 아내가 될 것이라 그리하면 이스라엘 자손이 각기 조상의 기업을 보전하게 되어

sentences.original_text: in any tribe of the children of Israel
shall be wife unto one of the family
sentences.korean_translation: 가족 중 한 사람의 아내가 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: of the tribe of her father
that the children of Israel may enjoy
every man the inheritance of his fathers
